title: Elements DLC
description: Test your might and face the elements.  This puzzle pack for Faeria contains 40 additional brain-twisting challenges for you to complete.  Can you overcome the elements and earn the exclusive cardback?  Warning: Many of these puzzles are quite difficult!
longDescription:
Master the Elements

Test your might and face the elements.

The Elements puzzle pack for Faeria contains 40 additional brain-twisting challenges for you to complete.

Your usual puzzle master, Jalmyr, has stepped aside to allow the elements to take over.

Do you have what it takes to overcome the very forces of nature?

Extreme Difficulty

Warning: Many of these puzzles are quite difficult!

Forty new puzzles ranging from low to extreme difficulty await you.

Solve them all and receive the equivalent of 10 Mythic Chests in rewards.

You can also earn the exclusive 'Elements' card back.if you’re somehow able to complete a selection of the most difficult puzzles inside.

Combo Challenges

A few of the puzzles in Elements feature powerful combo decks popularized by expert Faeria players.

Execute the “Ursus OTK,” “Super Toad,” or even the fabled “Ruby Yak OTK.”

You may learn of a new strategy you never thought of before! Take the knowledge with you into your next battle and surprise your opponent with an impressive series of moves.

If you’re a fan of interesting puzzles to solve in Faeria, you’ll love challenging the Elements.
